builder.title: AI Website Builder
builder.subtitle: Chat with AI to create your perfect website
builder.aiGreeting: Hello! I'm your AI website builder. Describe the website you want to create, and I'll help you build it. You can tell me about the design, features, colors, or any specific requirements you have.
builder.inputPlaceholder: Describe the website you want to create...
builder.startChatting: Start chatting with AI to generate your website

deploy.title: Deploy Your Website
deploy.subtitle: Choose your deployment platform and get your website live in minutes.

step1.title: Choose Deployment Platform
step1.subtitle: Select where you want to deploy your website

step2.title: Configure Your Deployment
step2.subtitle: Set up your project settings and domain
step2.projectNameHelp: This will be used in your deployment URL:
step2.customDomainHelp: You can configure this later in your hosting platform settings
step2.importantNoteText: You'll need to connect your GitHub account or upload your website files to complete the deployment. The actual deployment process will be handled by your chosen platform.

step3.title: Deployment Successful!
step3.subtitle: Your website has been successfully deployed.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or special requirements? Feel free to reach out anytime. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

tips.title: Tips for Quick Response
tips.budget: Let us know your budget range in advance for more accurate proposals
tips.schedule: If you have a project timeline, please mention it
tips.existing: If you have an existing website, please share the URL

service.title: We create customized responsive websites optimized for your business and brand
service.subtitle: We handle everything from planning to design, development, and deployment in a one-stop process, and through close communication with clients, we complete websites that satisfy both usability and design.

strategy.title: Purpose-driven 1:1 Strategic Planning
strategy.description: We provide planning optimized for your business goals and direction. We design strategic page structures that align with your site's objectives such as promotion, lead generation, reservations, and sales.

copywriting.title: Persuasive Copywriting
copywriting.description: We plan sentences that make users stay, click, and take action. Through effective copywriting that delivers your brand message, we increase your website's conversion rate.

design.title: High-Quality Design
design.description: We pursue visual perfection that aligns with your brand identity. We create websites that consider not only trendy and sophisticated design but also usability and accessibility.

seo.title: SEO Basic Setup + Search Engine Registration
seo.description: We set up structure and keywords considering search engine exposure, so you can expect search traffic from the moment your website opens.

responsive.title: 100% Responsive Design
responsive.description: We create perfectly responsive websites so content appears naturally on any device including PC, tablet, and mobile. We ensure optimal performance even in mobile-first user environments.

performance.title: Fast Website Performance
performance.description: Page loading speed directly affects user bounce rate. We build fast websites by removing unnecessary resources and optimizing code and image processing.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant Integration
aiAssistant.description: We integrate with the latest AI assistants like ChatGPT and Claude to automate customer inquiry responses, product recommendations, and reservation management. We provide 24/7 customer service to maximize business efficiency.

googleWorkspace.title: Google Workspace Integration
googleWorkspace.description: We implement business automation through perfect integration with Google Workspace including Gmail, Google Calendar, and Drive. We build smart business environments where email marketing, schedule management, and document sharing work seamlessly.

domain.title: Domain Connection and Management
domain.description: We handle everything from connecting existing domains to registering new domains in a one-stop process. We provide professional domain management services including SSL certificate installation, DNS setup, and subdomain configuration to ensure stable website operation.

process.title: Service Process
process.subtitle: We proceed with a systematic process from planning to deployment and AI integration

consultation.title: Consultation and Needs Analysis
consultation.description: Please share your creation purpose, expected number of pages, reference sites, etc.

quote.title: Quote and Schedule
quote.description: We provide accurate quotes and production schedules based on your requirements.

planning.title: Planning and Design
planning.description: Wireframe or mockup sharing → Feedback reflection → Confirmation

development.title: Development and Testing
development.description: Website construction including HTML/CSS, JS, CMS setup and testing on various devices

integration.title: Domain Connection and AI Integration
integration.description: Domain setup, SSL certificate installation, AI assistant and Google Workspace integration configuration

delivery.title: Final Review and Delivery
delivery.description: After completion of modifications and improvements, source delivery or direct upload to server

cta.title: "We create websites that best express your brand."
cta.subtitle: We handle everything from planning to deployment and AI integration in a one-stop process, prioritizing communication with clients. Partner with Code King Builder, a reliable web development partner.
